Name: Project Amalthea: Battlegrounds
About the game: Quarantine has been declared throughout Jupiter orbit due to outbreak of unknown disease. All the pilots are grounded except for the few ones allowed to participate in training battles. Join their ranks for blazing fast space battles with another players in this top-down shooter game. 16 pre-built classes, more than 200 skills and 4 different battleground game types: Capture the Flag, Battle Royale and Dungeon Raid. All those games have different mechanics and require cooperative efforts to master. Various weapon mechanics Different types of weapons allows you either to do mass damage, penetrate a shield or lay a trap. Each weapon category bears it's own unique mechanics and combat tactics: Rockets - high damage explosives Torpedoes - guided missiles Lasers - beam weapons with 100% shield penetration Machine guns - kinetic weapons with extra damage to unshielded targets Project Thebe
